覤字的基本解释

覤
xì
〔覤覤〕惊恐的样子，如“客乃覤覤然惊，拳拳然谢。”

覤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xì］
［《廣韻》許卻切，入陌，曉。］
亦作“覤1”。亦作“1”。
(1)恐惧。
(2)虫名。蝇虎。

覤字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覤； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1135第32
【正韻】迄逆切。同?。覤覤，驚懼貌。【莊子·天地篇】蔣閭葂覤覤然驚。【註】與?同。　又【集韻】色責切【正韻】生責切，?生入聲。義同。　【集韻】本作愬。亦作?。

覤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
覤字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
xì
[覤覤] A frightened look, such as "Ke Nai Yin is frightened and thankful for his fists."
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xì］
["Guangyun" Xu Queqie, enter the Mo, Xiao. ]
Also known as "覤1". Also known as "1".
(1) Fear.
(2) Insect name. Fly tiger.
Yin

[You Ji 1] [See the Department of Words] 　覤; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1135 Page 32
[Positive rhyme] so far reverse cut. with?. Yuen, horrified by appearance. 【Zhuangzi·Heaven and Earth】Jiang Luyou was shocked. [Note] Same as?　[Ji Yun] Color Responsibility Cut [Zheng Yun] Responsible Cut, and Sound. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】This is a surprise. Also for?.
